I read all the posts, but I don't think I respond very often, because it 
seems you guys have everything worked out anyway.  I just kinda like the 
game, and i'm interested in what you ppl have to say about it.  Oh one 
question though.... Have any of you fooled around with editing the graphics 
of gladiator, at all, because i have and it's fun :)

cya around
Tristan
